imdb.plot outline: Zoo Yoga is an instructional children's show designed for all ages. It is intended to be part of a child's fitness program, bringing the skills of yoga closer to the level of a child's interests, understanding and capabilities. Zoo Yoga is a useful tool for parents, teachers and day care providers. It is a fun, energetic, and creative way for children to stretch and play, an imaginative exploration that is effective for children as they explore balance, strength and flexibility.
imdb.title: Mikey Mike's Zoo Yoga
